messages.message: @jack.robbins this wasn't specifically a customer ask, but we have a good amount (15+) users per LoB testing in AI Hub for the Swiss Re PoV. Was trying to think of the best way for these users to test a few documents. Should be ~5-10 docs per user, but it might help the team managing this to ensure they're getting feedback from the business users they onboarded, testing enough docs/different docs.

Got it - probably the recommendation would be to separate the LoBs into different Workspaces for testing, and instruct the testers how to filter the review table to just reviews assigned to them. Once we have a dedicated Reviewer role (:crossed_fingers: end of Q1) it will automatically only show reviews assigned to the user.
